Thank you so much for being a part of #TeamCastor. Your support throughout the year has meant so much to me & my family.  Cherish your time with family & friends this holiday season! I’m wishing you & your loved ones a peaceful safe & happy holiday season & a wonderful New Year! https://t.co/StiaMLwYDn
This is what the founders intended to serve the public and not our personal interests.   Thank you for standing with me   Kathy https://t.co/aPm8n9Vnks

Meanwhile the important work for the people continues: to lower the costs of health care to fight for action on climate change to end gun violence to lower prescription drug costs and to improve the future for our kids. But today my oath required that I impeach the President
The President’s actions have left us no choice but to impeach. My Republican colleagues will have to explain their vote to their children and grandchildren.

Trump urged interference in our election and fired diplomats who stood in the way. Trump then obstructed the investigation into his misconduct. It is a stunning betrayal of America and America’s national security.

President Trump abused his power when he attempted to extort the vulnerable Ukrainian President Zelensky by withholding bipartisan foreign aid and pressed him to manufacture political dirt on a political rival.

Today the House of Representatives voted to impeach the President of the United States for abuse of power and obstruction of Congress. Trump betrayed the American people and the U.S. Constitution.  I did not make this decision lightly.

HEALTH CARE ALERT 🚨 #OpenEnrollment for 2020 ends tomorrow! #Florida neighbors can preview affordable plans available & can receive free advice from CoveringFlorida Navigators & other grassroots experts.   Help is available & appointments can be made at👇 https://t.co/sf66awNhSe

From my family to yours I want to wish you a very #HappyThanksgiving! I am grateful for my family and friends! I am truly grateful to all of you! It’s thanks to your tireless energy & support that I have the opportunity to serve in Congress & fight for our shared values. 🍽 🦃 https://t.co/JtEzzeCA1f
🙏🙏🙏 So thankful for this wonderful team who ❤️ our #Tampa community and our neighbors! https://t.co/YMoeCQRnGX

In reality Trump has worked to rip away protections from our most vulnerable neighbors block efforts to raise the minimum wage and cut investments in transit bridges and transportation improvements that keep us moving.    #TrumpsBrokenPromises

Trump promised that he would help protect our neighbors with preexisting conditions lower drug prices bring better and higher-paying jobs to #Florida and rebuild the Sunshine State’s infrastructure.  #TrumpsBrokenPromises

In public service it’s vital that you keep your word & keep standing up for your neighbors. We knew Trump’s a risky bet but he’s truly let us down. We won’t give up but jeez say what you mean & do as you say! #TrumpsBrokenPromises affect #Florida 👇 https://t.co/RBAl0jAnFG

We need to boost wages so paychecks can start to keep up with the cost of providing for a family.  I championed the #RaiseTheWage Act in the House & we passed it. Time for Republicans & Mitch McConnell to step up. Here’s one more smokescreen dissipated 👇 https://t.co/gUbJ63PRgk
It’s likely Trump knew the committee had received the complaint and that that knowledge informed his call with Sondland 👀

The timing of Sondland’s Sept 9 call matters: That same day the IG for the Intel. Community notified the House & Senate that an anonymous whistleblower had filed a complaint describing broad contours of Trump’s campaign to force Ukraine to interfere in the 2020 election.

Yesterday as Sondland testified on Capitol Hill Trump responded to Sondland’s testimony by recreating a Sept 9th call that Sondland acknowledged in his testimony & Republican’s held up as a slender reed of positive testimony. Trump told reporters that he told the ambassador 👇 https://t.co/HRHPFNmHle

Trump would host Ukrainian President Zelenskiy at White House in exchange for public statement that Ukraine would launch investigations into 2016 election & Burisma the co. linked to Vice President Biden's son Hunter – Amb. Sondland’s sworn testimony ...everybody knew about it https://t.co/p9tSY6G74H
Watch Ambassador Yovanovitch’s testimony: https://t.co/eFuOcZnu9f
Watch Ambassador Taylor & Deputy Assistant Secretary Kent’s testimony: https://t.co/XhFql9vv14

As more evidence of Trump’s betrayal of his oath & abuse of power comes to light we can take solace in the integrity of public servants who we otherwise wouldn’t have known & their steadfast devotion to our values in face of intimidation & wrongdoing by the Trump & his cronies

Ambassadors Yovanovitch & Taylor & Deputy Assistant Sec. Kent shined a spotlight on the important work that goes into protecting America’s national security interests. In contrast President Trump ends the week morally bankrupt again & an embarrassment to freedom-loving people. https://t.co/M09ApSNVmk
